name: Off Grid Technologies
tag_list: wind, solar, turbines, photovoltaic, energy, power, renewables, geothermal, maglev
overview:
We are experts in designing and installing renewable energy devices in commercial, industrial and residential applications. We offer the most cost-effective and reliable solution to our customers to supplement and or even provide for their complete energy needs through solar and wind electricity.

Whether your project involves the design and installation of a major renewable energy system, or you require an energy consultant to assess your organization’s energy saving potential, our highly qualified team offers a professional service to maximize your success.
